zone.line: Cursed, Cursed Creator! Why
did I lif live why in that instant
did I not extinguish the spark of
existence which you had so wantonly
bestowed? I know not — Despair had not
yet taken possession of me it w I
was enragedmy feelings were those
of rage & revenge — I wcould with plea
sure of torn ha ve destroyed the cottage
and its inhabitants, and glutted my
self with their shrieks & misery.They
AsWhen night came on I quitted
my retreat and wandered to the
wood. — And now No longer restrained
by the fear of discovery I gave vent
to my anguish in fearful howlings.
I was like a wild beast in the toils;
Tearingthe objects that obstructed
me with and fearranging through the
wood with stag like swiftness.
Oh! What a miserable night I passed.
the cold stars shone in mockery,
the bare trees waved their branches
above me and now and then the sweet
voice of a bird burst forth anidst
the universal stillness. — All save Iwere
at rest or in enjoyment but I. And
I like the arch fiend bore bo a hell
within me and, finding the my
self unsympathized with, I wi wished
to tear up of the trees, {?} spread havock
destroying
